metadata.ns:textReviewContext: Remote user interacts with a cloud application
metadata.ns:textName: AE05 Block Shared Resources Of Cloud Application
metadata.ns:textReviewSolution: Ensure strict division identifiers (names, IP addresses) of cloud infrastructure;
metadata.ns:textReviewProblem: Blocking shared resources of cloud application (e.g. shared external IP) by a third-part reputation service
